net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_DnDBeyondSpell
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Creates a DnDBeyond Spell RollExpression with an optional provided name.
There is no roll for a DnDBeyond Spell. just the selected spell that it applies

arg(0) = optional name of the DnDBeyond generated spell

A roll expression that can be used to indicate this expression came from spells found in DnDBeyond
